name: TrackShifts - Chase
description:
This is a game about a bad guy being chased by a good guy one minecarts. Only thing is that the bad guy can also chase the good guy.. Portals are used to change tracks via buttons in game. This is fast paced platformer so you might not be able to understand the game for first time and I am sorry for that. 

Features:

Buttons 1,2,3 are used to switch portals accordingly to the portal numbers.

Shoot is obviously used to Phew phew your target.

Brakes are used to play some cool tricks.

Objectives:

Keep your enemy in range.

Take him down.

NOTE: All the assets in the game including music are made by myself.
